metadata.title: CVE-2024-35856 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btusb: mediatek: Fix double free of skb in coredumphci_devcd_append() would free the skb on error so the caller don'thave to free it again otherwise it would cause the double free of skb.Reported-by : Dan Carpenter <dan.carpenter@linaro.org>

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
